the Dallas Cowboys overhauled their group of assistant coaches this off-season.
Richards is proud to join the Dallas Cowboys football organization. He is credited with
developed the famed legion of boom secondary and hopes to make a similar impact with the Cowboy's secondary.
The transition should be fairly seamless. The Cowboys and the Seahawks have similar principles when it comes to
playing defense. It just take a good football team, made of up of good players.
